text: Plenty of Power is the tenth studio album by Canadian heavy metal band Anvil, released in 2001. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ;Anvil *Steve "Lips" Kudlow – vocals, lead guitar *Ivan Hurd – lead guitar *Glenn Five – bass *Robb Reiner – drums ;Production *Pierre Rémillard – engineer, mixing *Andy Khrem – mastering *Torsten Hartmann – executive producer ==References== Category:Anvil (band) albums Category:2001 albums Category:Massacre Records albums
title: Plenty of Power
